public class DragAndDropItem

DragAndDropItem.java: Renders an overlay object which supports drag-and-drop.

Method Summary
 boolean isDragable()
          Checks if the specified object is currently moving to the position touched by the user.
 void setDragable(boolean dragable)
          Sets the object to the state of moving to the position touched by the user.

Method Detail

isDragable

public boolean isDragable()
Checks if the specified object is currently moving to the position touched by the user.
Returns:
true - the object is currently moving, false - not

setDragable

public void setDragable(boolean dragable)
Sets the object to the state of moving to the position touched by the user.
Parameters:
dragable - true - to set the object to the moving state, false - not
